article.headline: Southern Utah 72, Centenary 64
article.story: CEDAR CITY, Utah (AP) -- Henry Uhegwu scored 19 points, including a clinching 3-pointer with 1:25 to play, to lead Southern Utah to a 72-64 victory over Centenary Monday night. Esteban Bonzano went 4-4 from 3-point range and scored 12 points for the Thunderbirds (8-17, 6-6 Mid-Continent). Justin Allen also scored 12 points for Southern Utah, while Steve Barnes had 11 and Lubor Olsovsky added 10. Eric Holmes led Centenary (4-20, 2-11) with 18 points. Ronnie Martin scored 12 points, all in the second half, and Xavier Burnette had 10. Uhegwu scored the Thunderbirds' first seven points of the second half, bringing Southern Utah back from a 29-28 halftime deficit. Holmes tied it 42-42 with a jumper in the key and a layup in a 25-second span, but Bonzano put the Thunderbirds ahead for good on a 3-pointer from the left wing with 10:07 left. Uhegwu put the game out of reach when he hit a 3-pointer from the top of the key with the shot clock winding down, giving Southern Utah a 66-57 lead with 1:25 left. Uhegwu, Barnes and Allen combined to go 6-for-8 from the foul line in the final 50 seconds. Centenary's leading scorer, Chris Watson, scored five points in 10 minutes. Gents coach Rob Flaska said he was unhappy with Watson s defense and shot selection. The Gents played without Alexander Starr, who was hospitalized for dehydration in Las Vegas on Sunday. He dressed for Monday's game but did not play.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
